title: Before we begin,
prompt_start: Generate a main character who is a male and
prompt_after_number_of_girls: girls. Fill their information using JSON format:
prompt_story_start: Use the names to write one dialogue in a
prompt_after_story_format:
also follow these rules:
- mood can only be one of
prompt_places: - location can only be one of
prompt_end:
- If speaker is not the main character, dialogue may or may not be a question to the main character.
- If dialogue is a question to the main character, provide up to 3 answers and speaker of next one dialogue should not be the main character.
- If speaker is the main character, don't provide answers.
- Generate only one dialogue line. Don't finish the story.
- Respond only with JSON.
